about.title: About Afiyat Energy
about.description: Leading supplier of oil products and fertilizers in Uzbekistan with years of experience
about.history_text: Afiyat Energy was founded in the Mirzo-Ulugbek district of Tashkent and has been successfully operating in the oil products and fertilizers market for over 20 years.
about.history_text_additional: During this time, we have earned a reputation as a reliable partner who always fulfills their obligations and provides products of the highest quality.
about.values_quality_description: We guarantee the highest quality of all our products
about.values_reliability_description: We always fulfill our obligations on time
about.values_innovation_description: Continuous development and implementation of new technologies
about.mission_text: Our mission is to provide clients with quality oil products and fertilizers, contributing to the development of their business and agriculture in Uzbekistan
